title: Cleanup the data_driven configset
description:
I was looking at the data_driven config set and we could do some simple cleanups there.


	Remove commented out copyFields as they aren't adding any value here.
	Fix indentation in the managed-schema file
	in the solrconfig.xml file the spellchecker refers to non existent fields. Fix/Remove those as well. SOLR-8078 was created just for that so I'll mark that as a duplicate of this Jira
